summary: Added a living room / study directly bellow the children\'s room, used the walled room in the basement for a wine cellar (with new types of wine), and added some Hearthfire items like flour and milk throughout the house.
descriptionHtml:
[b]HEARTHFIRE NEEDED[/b]

Added a living room / study directly bellow the children\'s room, used the walled room in the basement for a wine cellar (with new types of wine), and added some Hearthfire items like flour and milk throughout the house.

[b]Includes:[/b]
[list][*]Living room directly bellow the children\'s room,
[*]Wine cellar in the basement,
[*]Hearthfire foor items throughout the house[/list]
author: Rajti15
